Title: Relates to the regulation of social media companies and social media platforms
Summary: Relates to the regulation of social media companies and social media platforms; provides for age requirements for the use of social media and parental consent; prohibits certain data collection from social media accounts; limits the hours a minor can have access to social media; establishes penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add Art 9-D §§149-c - 149-i, Gen Bus L; amd §94-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the executive law, in relation to the regulation of social media companies and social media platforms
